msbt.message: Thank you for the gift and letter, especially in this busy season! If only I was half as thoughtful and considerate as you! Allow me to try. Here, take this as a token of my gratitude for everything you do!

I was overjoyed to receive the gift and letter you sent me! It was so kind of you to go to the trouble during this hectic holiday season. I just had to return the gesture! I do hope you enjoy this present.

You're so on top of thingsâ€”sending out gifts and letters even during the holiday season! How DO you do it?! Well, I picked out a little gift for you too. I hope you like it! Here's to another fabulous year!

I confess, it makes me a little sad to think that this year will soon be over. But when I read your letter, it made me think that next year will be even better than this one. Let's make it that way together, shall we?
I've never liked how busy it gets at the end of the year. I've been feeling especially fatigued lately, but reading your message perked me right back up again! Thank you for the pick-me-up, darling!
It was so thoughtful of you to send me a message during this hectic year-end holiday season! With a friend like you, I can rest easy knowing that next year will be even more delightful than this one!
